tab1.text1:
This is a NEW PVE server mostly vanilla focused for solo balanced and challenging gameplay but with some timesaver boosts, like taming and breeding, to encourage players to use dinos for gather resources and hunt perfect tames, so you can stay less watching huge cooldown timers and also help Ark Newbies too with the new ASA features and changes, so be nice to others but most important thing: have fun!

Auto-lock structures is always ON but keep an eye and check to have everything locked and make a bed before logging out if you don't want to lose your things.

Mods are all aimed at QoL or adding new dinos not yet released for Ark Ascended, so the risk of bugs/breaks are high specially every new updates/fixes. PLEASE BE AWARE OF THIS and be careful because if a mod may break or don't work properly after every updates.
This is ARK Survival Ascended launch, things break, gameserver can crash cause they upgrading the virtual machines hosting them, dinos and gear can possibly get lost due to bugs and crashes.

GoldCoin, Exchange and Player Shops can be updated at anytime, so check them frequently.
(You can ask/vote for suggestion on discord soon)

Daily Server Restarts: 06:00 AM UTC+1

Console commands for better performance you can enter:
r.VolumetricFog 0
r.VolumetricCloud 0

KEEP SUPER IMPORTANT ITEMS IN GAME VANILLA STORAGES - IF A MOD BREAKS AND THE MODDED STORAGE DISAPPEARS, SO DO YOUR ITEMS/DINOS (THEY WILL NOT BE REFUNDED!!)

tab2.text1:
Your name cannot be Human or Humano,  Mensch or any other variation of the default names. Racist, inappropriate or highly offensive names are not allowed. Same for tribe name.
Make a tribe so the Admin knows the players who actively play and people who don't or left.
Any form of harassment, racism, homophobia etc. will not be tolerated.

No Spawn Camping/Building. Spawn points are maded for all people to be able to get Resources/arctifacts in the game, This is not Single Player Mode!

Be polite to your neighbors. Base building is a first come, first serve for locations. Always look around first before you start building a mega-base.

Pillar/foundation spamming is NOT allowed, in any way. Admins will clean up any spamming without any discussions. Do not stack foundation to build walls or fences.

You are allowed to build ONE base per tribe in a map and you can of course have a starter base and when you move to a new location please demolish the starter once you have moved.
Reserving spots is NOT allowed. When you start building, finish it.

Please try keep player, dino, tribe-names civil. We are adults so this wont be heavily enforced, but use your discretion.

Please try keep bases as reasonable as possible, again this wont be heavily enforced but its good practice to keep servers running nicely in the long term.

No Offline breeding. No Dino Wandering.

If you need admin help your best bet is to ask on the discord!

tab4.text1:
(some settings may get fixed/changed at anytime due to balancing gameplay)

DINO MAX LEVELS:
Regular Wild 150
TEKs 180
Rock Drakes / Wyverns 190
Shiny 190

RATES:
XP Gain = x2
Player Harvest: x2
Dino Harvest: x5
Realistic and fast Taming/Breeding
Mating Interval: Min/Max 15/25 Minutes
Egg Hatch Speed: 1-5 Minutes
Baby Mature Speed: 2-30 Minutes
Imprinting: 1 imprint for 100%

tab5.text1:
Custom Dinos currently active in the server, added by custom mods not yet released by the official game + Spawn Locations:

- Fire, Ice, Poison and Lightning Wyverns (Volcano, Snow Mountains, Swamp, Ice lakes)
- Crystal Isles Ember, Blood and Tropical Wyverns (Volcano, Forests, Rivers)
- Inferno Wyverns (1% spawn instead other Wyverns)
- Basilisks (Swamp, Redwood Forest)
- Candy Golem (Mountains)
- Deinonychus (Jungles)
- Gachas (Beaches, Jungles)
- Featherlights (Forests, Redwood Forest)
- Glowtails (Forests, Redwood Forest)
- Griffins/Snow Griffins + Prisimine* (Anywhere near Mountains)
- Ice Golems (Mountains)
- Jerboas (Beahces, Jungles)
- Maewings (Rivers)
- Magmasaurs (Redwood Forest - Not tameable yet);
- Managarmrs (Ice Lakes/Snow Mountains)
- Mantis (Swamp)
- Parrots (Dimorphodons shared spawns)
- Phoenixes (Quetzal shared spawns - KO Tame right now)
- Ravagers (Redwood Forest)
- Reapers (Redwood Forest)
- Rejuvenating Dragons (Beaches)
- Rock Drakes (Redwood Forest)
- Rock Golems (Mountains)
- Roll Rats (Forests)
- Sand Dragons (Beaches)
- Shinehorns (Beaches)
- Sinomarcrops (Forests)
- Snow Owls and R-Snow Owls + Prisimine* (Snow Biome Mountains)
- Thorny Dragons (Forests, Jungles) 
Prisimine is a special glowing dino, can rarely spawn instead of the normal version (5% Spawn Chance)

TEK DINOS:
Tek Giganotosaurus
Tek Mosasaurus
Tek Parasaur
Tek Quetzal
Tek Raptor
Tek Rex
Tek Stego
Tek Trike
Tek Alphas spawns too.

For informations about taming mods added dinos check discord
